name: Time: Loneliness
description:
Story

You reached the office you need to go and know you're trying to get out.

Controls

W, A, S, D and space for movement and Left Mouse Click to speak to the others.

How to Play

Try to gain enough knowledge to pass the level and don't lose all of your significance. Once you exit a room, you cant get back. Don't rush because the door may close if you rush.

Goals

Gain enough knowledge by speaking to others, listening to music, and reading books to pass the level.

Other Information

This short game made for Game 301 Course's final assignment. This game is full of sub-messages, metaphors, and symbolism.

Credits

I used different tracks from Linkin Park and Starset which felt the same vibe as the game.

Gameplay Video
